data.title: News
data: Add a link to review the application

data.title: News
data: Add a PIN code management for PayUTC sellers

data.title: Changes
data: Show a message when (un)locking a badge

data.title: Fixed bugs
data: Show the right name in welcome screen
Fix definitly the deprecated version protocol

data.title: News
data: Add a profile screen to show all user data

data.title: Fixed bugs
data: It was impossible to build under iOS
The balance was available if equals to 0
The last transaction did not show
Persistant data after log out has been fixed
Documents could be shown in the wrong encoding

data.title: New features
data: Add description and screenshots to the README, on the Play Store and the Apple Store

data.title: Changes
data: Full search in history, now search also with fundations

data.title: Fixed bugs
data: The application crashed on Samsung Galaxy S7
The version checker did not work as expected

data.title: Changes
data: History only shows 50 by 50 transactions. Clicking on 'show more...' show the next 50

data.title: Fixed bugs
data: Only save once the data fetched from Internet
Do no more show exponential 'loading' transactions

data.title: New features
Show history
data: By periods: 10 last, day, week, month, ever
By categories: all, purchased, refills, transfers
